select id, org_code, org_name, short_name, main_industry, org_type, parent_code, parent_name, org_path, org_country, s_state, sub_count, l_level, short_code, capacity, jt_code, sort, is_normal, installed_units, reted_voltage, location, province, linkman, telephone, coordinate_sys, longitude, latitude, assets_ratio, access_situation, isalignment, is_production, equipment_capacity, design_capacity, is_increase, production_time, intro_image, intro_text, is_ts, power_capacity, power_unit, battery_manufacturer, battery_type, support_form, inverter_manufacture, inverter_model, inverter_capacity, first_startup_time, year_power, year_user_hour, electricity_price, actual_capacity, full_name, simple_name, create_by, create_by_name, create_at, update_by, update_by_name, update_at, registered_capital, legal_representative, establish_time from sys_org where s_state ='1' AND parent_code=#{pid}
